hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a small #Fairy Fountain#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #0# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #Farore's Wind#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Central Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Spirit Temple# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple After Wind Enemy Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #Zora's River#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: Did you know that Dark Link's max health is equal to @'s max health?

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Evil's Bane#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #Morpha#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Third Right Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Saria's Song# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #1# major item.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Deku Shield# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Bomb Flower Platform Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: I bet you'd like to have more bombs.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Damp's Hut#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.
